user.title: Order Placed
user.body:
Your order with the store store_name is successfully placed. 
Once store representative accept the accept the order, you will be notified.

store.title: Order Placed
store.body: A customer user_name has placed an order with your store. Please check and accept the order based on availability of products or services.

user.title: Order Accepted
user.body: Your order is accepted and also changed based on the products and services available at store store_name.

user.title: Order Accepted
user.body: Your order is accepted by store_name

user.title: Order Rejected
user.body: Your order is rejected by store_name

store.title: Order Cancelled
store.body: Your store order is cancelled by user_name

user.title: Pickup ready
user.body: Your order is ready for pickup at store_name

user.title: Delivery ready
user.body: Your order is ready for delivery by store_name

user.title: Reward Points Earned
user.body: You have earned rewardPointsEarnedPerOrder reward points for your order with store_name

user.title: Reward Points cancelled
user.body: The reward points were cancelled as the order order_id is no longer valid with store store_name

requested.title: Grab Your Lead
requested.body: There is an auction request from a customer, to grab the customer to your store, please place a bid with competitive offer

cancelled.title: Auction cancelled
cancelled.body: The reverse auction has been cancelled by user_name

store_offer.title: Bid offer from Store for your request
store_offer.body: There is a bid offer from store store_name for your bid request. Please check and accept if you like it.
